author: Maque Garcia
text:
Trust the magic of new beginnings! May this 2022 bring you and your loved ones health,  love , peace, joy, success, abundance and many reasons to smile every single day! 
Cheers to a new year full of blessings! 
Happy New Year! 🍾💫🙌🌟 https://t.co/yPEH7KJZzj

author: Maque Garcia
text:
Happy birthday @AdrianGarciaHTX. All the Best for this year! 
Thank you so much for all the great work you do for our city every day! https://t.co/Qbd1bFmJpa

author: Maque Garcia
text:
Please know that someone is always there for you, especially at this time of the year. Call 800-273-8255 (National Suicide Prevention Helpline US).
Could two followers please copy and re-post this tweet? Let's look out for each other.  🙏

author: Maque Garcia
text: Thank you so much for all  your prayers and for sending all the great  thoughts for Tuti!  They were very powerful and my sister is out of her surgery.  Thank you again 💖

author: Maque Garcia
text:
Please keep my sister Tuti  in your prayers and positive healing thoughts.  She is going to have a very delicate surgery tomorrow morning.  
Thank you so much! 💖🙏

author: Maque Garcia

author: Maque Garcia
text:

author: Maque Garcia
text:
New definition of insanity:

" Refusing a vaccine specially made for humans because it's neither reliable nor safe,  but taking an anti-parasitic medicine for horses and thinking this is a very effective way to treat Covid." https://t.co/TTx9U2K01E
